sys_remote_update_set.description:
Merged following update sets: 1. OCIO SR 2018 11 06 b MGIM a. SB-1056: Updated HTML Content by adding <a href="mailto:cschelp@gov.bc.ca"> on the NOTIF 01, 02, 04, 07, 08, 09. b. SB-1057: Updated the HTML Content to remove the extra vertical space on NOTIF 01, 02, 07 c. SB-1058: Updated the HTML Content to add an extra space after area code for Notif 01, 02, 04, 07, 08, 09 d. SB-1049: Updated the Descriptions on the Notification requested: NOTIF 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, and Renamed the NOTIF 06
2. OCIO SR SB 1054 ACL RITM Comments-v01 a. Rolled back changes implemented as part of JIRA SB-817 and SB-1033 to provide users to enter comment from portal
sys_remote_update_set.name: OCIO SR 2018 11 07 a

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_b11a7106c0a8016613c6fa98d7e266a4
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>false</advanced><condition table="sc_req_item">request.requested_for=javascript:gs.getUserID()^ORu_item_requested_for=javascript:gs.getUserID()^ORu_item_requested_by=javascript:gs.getUserID()^EQ<item endquery="false" field="request.requested_for" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="javascript:gs.getUserID()"/><item endquery="false" field="u_item_requested_for" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="javascript:gs.getUserID()"/><item endquery="false" field="u_item_requested_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="javascript:gs.getUserID()"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><description>end user can update their own sc_req_item records</description><name>sc_req_item</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>myla.jordan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-05-02 14:26:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>b11a7106c0a8016613c6fa98d7e266a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sc_req_item</sys_name><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">119be83fdb710300ae0690f9db96194d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_b11a7106c0a8016613c6fa98d7e266a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-07 17:13:00</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_action_d0cb768adb996b0050479eb6db961976
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsefalsetrueb69d02137f232200ee2e108c3ffa9142sc_req_itemstate=4^cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQtext/htmlNotification to the Requested by and/or the Requested for, as recorded on the Request Item. A notification is always sent to the requested by, regardless of whether or not they have selected the 'notify me' option. Note that we are only doing this for the Requested by. the Requested for will continue to only get the notification if they have asked for it. This notification is sent when a Request Item/Task state is changed to 'Closed Incomplete'. This happens when the Service request item is not fulfilled. 

 

]]>falseSC_request.closed.notify_CSCtruefalsefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1false${event.parm2}, Service Request Item ${number} has been Closed Incomplete: ${mail_script:callrecord.short_description}

Close notes: ${close_notes}

Request Number: ${request.number}
Request Item Number: ${number}
Requested For: ${u_item_requested_for.first_name} ${u_item_requested_for.last_name}
Requested By: ${u_item_requested_by.first_name} ${u_item_requested_by.last_name}

For updates on your Service Request please contact the Customer Service Centre at (250) 387-7000 option 3 or via email at cschelp@gov.bc.ca.

Please do not reply, this is an auto-generated message.

 

]]>BCGOV-SR-NOTIF09 CSC Service Request Closed Incomplete (Requestor)true100falsefalse
sys_update_xml.target_name: BCGOV-SR-NOTIF09 CSC Service Request Closed Incomplete (Requestor)

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_action_6698337ddbc0230066d656086896192b
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsetruetrueb69d02137f232200ee2e108c3ffa9142sc_req_itemstate=1^cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKE4deda47edb1113003d1dd001cf9619b2^cat_item.sc_catalogsNOT LIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQtext/htmlNotification to the Requested by and/or the Requested for, as recorded on the Request Item. A notification is sent to one or both of these people based on whether the 'notify' flag is checked on. This notification is generated when service request item is created from a catalog item in the OCIO Catalog.  

 

]]>falseOCIO_SR_sc_req_item.inserted.notifytruefalsefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1false${event.parm2}, Service Request Item ${mail_script:URI_REF_SP} has been opened: ${cat_item}

${cat_item.short_description}

Request Number: ${request.number}
Request Item Number: ${mail_script:URI_REF_SP}
Requested For: ${u_item_requested_for.first_name} ${u_item_requested_for.last_name}
Requested By: ${u_item_requested_by.first_name} ${u_item_requested_by.last_name}

To view updates on this service request please visit the Self-Serve Portal. Alternatively, you can contact the Customer Service Centre at (250) 387-7000 option 3 or via email at cschelp@gov.bc.ca.

Please do not reply, this is an auto-generated message.

 

]]>BCGOV-SR-NOTIF01 Service Request Opened (Requestor)true100falsetrue
